General.Name: Caltagirone SpA
General.Description: Caltagirone SpA, through its subsidiaries, engages in the cement production, infrastructure, real estate, finance, and publishing activities. It offers cement, aggregates, concrete, and value-added products; manages, leases, sells, enhances, and maintains residential properties; and undertakes civil engineering and construction works. The company was founded in 1892 and is headquartered in Rome, Italy. Caltagirone SpA is a subsidiary of Finanziaria Italia 2005 SpA.
